contest-event.event-date:
May 13, 2000 D SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (First Section)
SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (First Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest ebbw-vale-contest-first-section
Test Piece Contest
The Belmont Variations
Ebbw Vale Leisure Centre, Ebbw Vale, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - cornet - Pontardulais. Prizes - 1st £125, 2nd £75, 3rd £60. 4 bands competed.
Aug. 14, 2015, 4:26 p.m. June 30, 2020, 9:30 p.m.
1 Pontardulais Town Band C. Brian Buckley
2 Penclawdd Brass Tony Small
3 Tylorstown Band Leigh Phillips
4 Treherbert & District Band Graham Sheppard
Withdrawn Markham and District Band Nigel Seaman
